Half-Life 2... HMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM que jogo bom mano! Ele tem tudo de um jogo INCRÍVEL que possa existir, como Soundtrack fodástica, com músicas muito bem feitas, história emocionante, e incrível, fora que pra 2004, o jogo faltava ser muito real, mas ainda fico um pouco surpreendido com esses gráficos. Eu recomendo sinceramente que qualquer um que puder, compre Half-Life 2, porque tá muito barato, só 20 pila, além de que na promoção fica apenas 2 REAIS!!! Se você não comprar esse jogo por 2 REAIS, PREÇO DE UM SALGADO NA LANCHONETE DA ESQUINA, VOCÊ TÁ COMETENDO UM ERRO IMENSO! COMPRE ESTE JOGO LINDO, SEUS OUTROS DOIS EPISÓDIOS E SEJA FELIZ CARA!!!

Сразу скажу, что интеллект напарников - самый худший интеллект, который я когда либо видел, за исключение тех, кто хвалит эту гамилу. Компьютерные идиоты всегда стоят там, где не должны: либо на пути к оступлению, либо, наоборот, перед тобой. Пользы от них 0. Одного хедкраба убить не в стостоянии. Вечно путаются под ногами. Например, вы стоите в коридоре - за угом враг, вы делаете шаг вправо - даете очередь и назад.... НО НЕ ТУТ ТО БЫЛО ! Сбоку от вас стоит компьютерный дебил, который успел подбежать и теперь мешает вам спрятаться! И вы получаете все очередь в дыню.

Игра совершенно неинтересная. Совершенно! Абсолютно не пожалел, что не поиграл в нее 15 лет назад. Движок вроде неплохой, но эта игра про ныряние в мутную воду! Видно, что разрабтчики очень любили воду и любили купаться. Потому что воды в этой игре столько, что чувствуешь себе водолазом. Да, я уже говорил, что играть не интересно? так вот, сюжет тоже убогий. И самое отвратное, что и концовки как таковой нет. 

Еще поиграл и считаю своим долгом дополнить, что играть просто противно. Такое отторжение я не чувствовал со времен биошока. Огромное количество времени надо ехать на каком-то убогом водном скутере, потом пересаживаешься на ржавый тарантас, потом, навреное, на велосипед, потом на катамаран, потом на яхту, потом на плот из бревен, потом на лодку, потом серфенговую доску, потом, неверняка, геймплей будет разнообразен катанием в тазу, на тачке, потом дадут палку с пружиной для прыжков, тоже ржавую.... Но мне это уже не интерено.  И видимо это и есть великая игра... Просто плеваться охота. И эту игру сравнивают с Думом 3....

[b] Gra jest świetną kontynuacją Half-Life z 1998. Historia tym razem jest urozmaiconą dodatkami, na które pozwala silnik Source. Fabuła normalna, nie pokręcona i łatwa do zrozumienia. 

[h1] KOŃCOWA OCENA: 9/10 [/h1] [/b]

Я всегда стараюсь наполнить рецензию к игре хоть как-нибудь, но тут мне пришло в голову оценить пройденные и сыгранные мною игры, написав дополнительно пару слов. И чтобы сам мог запомнить, и чтобы рейтинг у игры поменялся.

Отчего-то эту серию любит огромное количество игроков и некоторые совершенно искренне хотели бы увидеть продолжение, но я это отношение не разделяю.
После множества игр, где нам дают побыть в великолепных мирах, в теле крутых героев, в увлекательнейших историях, эта серия выглядит откровенно слабо.
Ни особенных противников, ни особенной механики, ни цепляющего действа.

В целом, игра качественна, но слишком уж неказиста относительно более свежих игр, на мой взгляд.
И сейчас она представляет ценность только как часть истории видеоигр, достойная того, чтобы не быть забытой.

7/10

This game sucks. Where are all the microtransactoins? How am I supposed to know what to do when there are no checkpoint markers and nothing glows? Surely I'm not expected to immerse myself in the game and work it out myself? There are no cutscenes so I have no idea how you are supposed to follow the story. There aren't even any of those cutscenes/QTE that show your character doing awesome things, I think your expected to actually use skill and do them yourself! I also don't understand why there is no X-ray vision or tagging enemies as this is something that would greatly enhance the game. At least it's good to see game developers have learn't from this game and aren't making the same mistakes these days.

以前玩半条2的时候，玩到游艇一关就想吐，一直就没有通关过，这一次终于花了3块钱打算体验一下神作的魅力，原来开了窗口模式就好很多，而且也就前面几关容易眩晕，过了游艇就好多了，大概跟前面画风太阴沉有关系，不得不说半条命2真的是神作，放在2018年，这剧情，这设计手感，这17号城市的设计，太棒了。无载入画面，这游戏的沉浸感真的无与伦比

Man, where to start with this one... It's one of the greatest games ever made, and well worth the hype. If you haven't played it, you should. What makes the game so outstanding is how varied it is. As good as Doom 2016 is (one of the best in its genre) you only do one thing in it; you shoot. In HL2 the levels are so varied that you can go from shooting, to driving, to manning a turret, to taking down a chopper etc. It really is some amazing variety.
Pick this game up! You won't regret it.
Besides, it's like a buck right now.

C'est j'ai toute votre attention ? On vas pouvoir commencer . Si vous êtes pauvre comme moi voici une méthode simple pour avoir ce jeu gratuitement ( a condition d'avoir d'autre jeux sur steam ) . 

1) Aller dans votre inventaire , puis dans l'onglet steam . Regarder si vous avez des cartes steam de jeu ( pour avoir des badges ) ensuite vendez les tous (voir meme des skins dont vous ne vous servez pas ) et si vous en aviez assez , vous avez maintenant assez d'argent pour pouvoir acheter ce jeu

There is no other game on the face of this planet that is better than Half-Life 2, If you have played this game all the way from the begining and to the end you will agree with me, its indisputable. Some might say it's merely a game, I don't see Half-Life 2 as just a game, I see it as a part of my life, and even if you didn't enjoy the game itself, look at all of the hard work that the developers put into this game, so many things are in this game that are not in others, as most other games all have similarities, Half-Life 2 has unique features seen nowhere else. If Half-Life 2 was the only game I could play for the rest of my life I would be happy, Half-Life 2 will always be the best so I encourage others that have not experienced Half-Life 2 to purchase this game right now.

[h1]Synopsis[/h1]
Half Life 2 is a masterpiece made by Valve, short and simple.  When this game came out in 2004, it was an advancement that would take gaming further than it ever had been before.  Even today, 14 years later, it's graphics are still comparable with new games and it's physics is still unmatched.  There are a lot of people who only get this game to have add-on's in Garry's Mod, but I feel that anybody who has not played this masterwork yet should.  

[h1]Physics Engine[/h1]
I don't know what to really say besides that this is one of the most advanced physics engines ever created in gaming.  In 2004, no one had ever seen such things in a video game.  It was utterly breathtaking back then, and still so today (especially after you realize this game was made 14 years ago.)  The ability to use the gravity gun/other items to break, throw, explode and utilize different objects around the map is fairly unique.  Once you get the gravity gun after getting to Eli's lab, you don't really need to use as much ammo anymore, as suddenly the entire world around you has become a weapon at your disposal.  

[h1]Story[/h1]
I might just be weird, but when I get bored, I will sometimes listen to vocal walkthrough's of the story of Half Life.  The events of Half Life 2 picks up around twenty years after Half Life 1, and the explanation of things that have happened in-between are explained brilliantly by the rebel's and your fellow Scientist's and Allies.  Marc Laidlaw's talents at writing stories is something to behold for yourself.  I can't really describe it in any other way besides that it is beautiful.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
If you like action games, then you will be extremely excited for hours on end while playing this.  I can't tell you how many times I jumped after suddenly being attacked by zombies or Combines.  With the use of the physics engine, the gameplay of Half Life 2 is incredibly realistic.  Things break when they are supposed to break.  Enemies die when they are supposed to die and react pretty realistically.  You will be on the edge of your seat for the whole time you play this game.

[h1]Overview[/h1]
What else can be said about this game that has already been said?  There is a reason this game was awarded 39 Game of the Year awards, best game of the decade, a 96/100 Metacritic (PC) score and 10/10 Steam score.  I also believe that what I have said above is reason enough to buy this game.  At the time of me writing this, the game is on sale for 90% off, making it only $1 dollar.  If you don't have this already, pick it up now; it is worth every cent.  And even the usual $10 dollar price is well worth it.  If you don't have this game already, do yourself a favor and pick it up.
EXCELENTE , MAGNIFICO ES  UNA PASADA.
